channel.title: 508 HD Client Help!
channel.description:
I run it, and it wont work.. gets stuck at Connecting to server.|
I run build and it says cannot find specified folder. I have C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\ (I don't know how to access the javac part so I can't got any further) :( This is teh current one: [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java pause[/code]
I don't know what to do to fix it.
Help Please.

item.title: 508 HD Client Help!
item.dc:creator: @Lumpylog Lumpylog
item.description:
@Lumpylog wrote:

Your Master:

Some people can’t play HD.

Well, I have before, theres gotta be a fix for this so I’m going to keep trying.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 HD Client Help!
item.dc:creator: @Lumpylog Lumpylog
item.description:
@Lumpylog wrote:

[quote=“Aleksander, post:2, topic:292827”]Make your current one:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java pause

Tell me if that works or not.[/quote]

Nah, I’ve tried that.

Read full topic
